remediation: Upgrade t3s/content-consent to version 1.0.3, 2.0.2 or higher.
title: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key due to improper verification of content element identifiers within the plugin. An attacker can display unauthorized content elements by exploiting the lack of access control checks.
